description: Factors, multiples, prime numbers, divisibility rules, LCM and HCF.

concepts.name: Factors and Multiples
concepts.description: Finding factors and multiples of numbers, common factors and multiples
common_misconceptions: Forgetting 1 and the number itself as factors
question_patterns: What is the smallest number that is a multiple of both {A} and {B}?
What is the highest common factor of {A} and {B}?
example_stems: What are all the factors of 36?

concepts.name: Prime and Composite Numbers
common_misconceptions: Forgetting 2 is the only even prime
question_patterns: Which of these numbers is prime: {list}?
Express {N} as a product of prime factors.
How many prime numbers are between {A} and {B}?
example_stems: Write 84 as a product of its prime factors.

concepts.name: Divisibility Rules
common_misconceptions: Confusing divisibility rules for different numbers
Not checking all conditions for composite divisors
Forgetting divisibility by 3 uses digit sum
question_patterns: Which numbers in the list are divisible by both {A} and {B}?
example_stems: What digit in the ones place makes 47_ divisible by 6?

concepts.name: Number Properties and Patterns
concepts.description: Square numbers, triangular numbers, odd/even properties
question_patterns: What is the next square number after {N}?
The sum of two consecutive triangular numbers is always a {type}. What type?
Is the product of {description} odd or even?
example_stems: The product of three consecutive integers is always divisible by what number?
